article: Women ' s fashions change more rapidly than men ' s . In the early 1990 ' s , all women wore their skirts to the ankle . Today , some skirts are even longer than before , but some are very short . Women ' s shoes have also gone through all sorts of boots for women were very common at the beginning of this century . Then for years , they were not considered fashionable . Today , they ' re back again in all colours , lengths and materials . In fact , today ' s women can wear all types of clothes on almost any occasion . While all of these changes were taking place in women ' s fashions , men ' s clothing remained almost the same until a few years ago . And , in fact , most men are still dressed in the kinds of clothes they used to wear .

model: all kinds of clothes they wear .
any kinds of clothes they like
human: any kinds of clothes they like
